description:
Learning the French tenses can be time consuming and, unfortunately, rather boring if you follow the 'traditional' methods. Enroll in this course and I will help you master the 10 most important tenses in the fastest and most efficient way possible by learning how each tense is formed, when it is used and, to make it even simpler to remember, what the English equivalent is!

Content Last Updated: MayÂ 2016

Over 3,900 students are already profiting from this course!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

See what my current students have to say:

"This course is an excellent tool to anyone learning French" - Audry Candida Da Silva Wickham

"This course is presented in a direct, easy to learn manner. I expected to master the 10 main tenses fast, and that is exactly what I learn from this course. Highly recommended!" - Michael Lim

"A nice summary of the different French tenses. Very handy for someone wanting to delve into the language more deeply." - David Khoury

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Work your way through the tenses in easy-to-follow lectures, then test what you have learned at the end of each section - as a professional languages teacher and tutor my experience has shown time and time again that by revising our learning after short bursts we are able to remember information MUCH more effectively!

Enroll in this course today and it is GUARANTEED to help your knowledge and understanding of the French tenses. Whether you are taking your exams, finals or are just brushing up on your already-developed language skills then this course WILL help! Don't forget, you are covered by a MASSIVE 30-day no-quibble money back guarantee, so if you don't love the course then you can get a refund with no questions asked!

I am always here to take questions and I will ALWAYS respond to you. I already teach OVER 5,900 HAPPY STUDENTS on my Learn to Speak: Conversational French course at Udemy. The Conversational French course is great for improving your spoken French, and would work brilliantly alongside the Tenses course.
title: French Tenses Simplified: Master the 10 Main Tenses Quickly!
